title: "Machine learning based differentiation of glioblastoma from brain metastasis using MRI derived radiomics"
excerpt: "Few studies have addressed radiomics based differentiation of Glioblastoma (GBM) and intracranial metastatic disease (IMD). However, the effect of different tumor masks, comparison of single versus multiparametric MRI (mp-MRI) or select combination of sequences remains undefined."
